ing: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or more to taste
1 teaspoon sea salt, or more to taste
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste
1/4 teaspoon dried thyme, or more to taste
des: "An excellent, almost copy-cat version of the traditional Shake'N BakeÂ®, but gluten-free. Some things are worth copying, especially for our kids!"
ins: Combine cornmeal, brown rice flour, almonds, paprika, garlic powder, sugar, salt, pepper, oregano, basil, thyme, rosemary, and chile pepper together in a large resealable plastic bag.
